entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rouyn-Noranda
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rouyn Airport 1:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: S 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
